inn1.comm: on target immediately, good length on middle and off, moving away a touch, defended back to the bowler
lands on a good length outside off, pushes Haddin back who defends it watchfully in the direction of cover
slightly short outside off, guided off the back foot to third man, off the mark
good testing line outside off, Clarke is drawn forward but does well, blocking it solidly towards cover
good cricket all around, sightly overpitched on the off stump, driven with a full face wide of mid-off where Graeme Smith dives full length to his right to keep them down to just a single
timber! South Africa have struck early. Short and wide, gets on the back foot to punch it through the covers, gets a big inside edge bang onto the leg stump
back of a length on middle, Clarke defends it watchfully back to the bowler
a touch full on middle and leg, gets across the line and drives it to midwicket
full outside leg though it did come back in a touch, struck Clarke on the pads as he tried to flick it behind square, but that can't be given
good ball, good length on middle and off, a hint of away movement there, defended off the back foot into the off side
slightly short  but just outside off, Clarke shoulders arms to that one
good pace, much fuller and holding its line, Clarke gets forward and lets it go through
what a way to start! It's in his zone though, banged in short on middle, gets gets back and pulls it away powerfully, it lands on the full on the deep square-leg boundary
good length on the off stump, much better, gets forward to defend, gets a thick inside edge wide of square leg for a single
fuller outside off, moving away a hint, left alone to the keeper
slightly overpitched outside off, Clarke leans into the drive and strikes it firmly but straight to cover
just a gentle push between mid-off and cover for an easy single, Steyn maintaining that line in the channel outside off
banged in short on the off stump, looks to defend it towards point, gets a thick inside edge behind square
a teasing line outside off stump, bowled from wide of the crease to create that angle away from the batsman, left alone
good stuff from Parnell, fuller on middle and off, driven gently back to the bowler

excellent start from South Africa! Parnell got this to land on a good length outside off and it moved away after pitching, bowled at 138.1 kmph, Ponting  attempted a drive on the up, got a thick edge and Boucher dived well to his right, stretching to pouch a sharp chance
fullish outside off, tempting line but Hussey isn't taking risks, left alone
slightly short outside off, holding its line, lets it go again
good length on the off stump, a hint of inward movement there, defended solidly to cover
too straight, full on middle, driven between midwicket and mid-on, firmly struck and he gets three
short and wide, goes for a monstrous cut through point, probably bounced more than he expected, just beat the outside edge
back of a length on the off, sharp pace of 140.8 kmph, punched into the off side towards point
much straighter, short on middle, tries to turn it away behind square, misses and is struck in the ribs
shaping away from the right hander there, landing full outside off and moving away sharply, Hussey does a good job letting it go
Parnell is on a roll! Swinging into the right hander, full on middle, gets his front foot across to flick it away through the midwicket region, misses and is struck dead in front of middle and leg
Parnell will be a touch disappointed with that, short of a length outside off, now why would Michael chase that first up?
straying on the pads this time, short again, tucked away behind square to get off the mark
much better, fullish on the off stump, goes for a blazing drive through the covers, hits the inside half of the bat and rolls wide of midwicket
slower one, an offcutter to the left hander, worked away behind square for a single
a touch too wide and is probably luck to get away with a wide there, short and David Hussey lets it go
short of a length on the off stump, left alone, good carry through to the keeper who collects it waist high
a bit of movement into the left hander this time, wide enough for him to let it go
short of a length on middle and leg, turned away to fine leg
good bounce for Steyn, banged in short outside off, spits off the pitch and Davod Hussey goes for the upper cut, it's a little too high though
they've been a little generous on the wides today, landed outside off and moved away beyond the white indicator
short of a length on the off stump, punched to cover on the back foot

Australia are reeling here! Poor shot from David Hussey, good length outside off and the customary away movement, he stays rooted in his crease and without any foot-movement tries to force it through the off side, gets a faint nick and Boucher does the rest
persists with that teasing line outside off, Michael Hussey lets it go through to the keeper

the late movement does him in! It's Parnell's day! Full on leg stump and moved away really late, Hussey was already into the attempted push back towards the bowler, missed it as the ball left him and was struck plumb in front of middle
short of a length outside off, left alone to the keeper
back of a length again, punched to cover off the back foot
fuller, on the off stump, drives on the up towards mid-off
short of a length, just wide of the off stump, chopped down to point
bouncer banged in on middle, Ferguson ducks under it well
kept a little low there, good length on the off and moving away, left alone
much fuller, a driving length there but Ferguson taking no risks there, left alone
bowled from wide of the crease, angling into the batsman, short on middle, is nicely behind it and blocks it to cover
short of a length outside off, moving away, withdraws from the shot at the right time, was looking to prod at it initially
banged in short on the off stump, drops it down with soft hands towards third man
back of a length on middle, shuffles and pushes it towards midwicket
first boundary in a long time, full and wide, Ferguson is tempted, slices it over point, well struck, raced to the boundary
confidently played, short on the off stump, punched to cover off the back foot, sweet sound of bat hitting ball though that went straight to the fielder
full outside off, chases it, opens the face to play it towards third man
good length on the off stump, gets forward and drives it straight to point
shot, these two are going for it when the opportunity is there, full and wide, Hopes bends and drives it powerfully over the covers, nicely done
on middle and leg, gets back and drops it wide of midwicket for a single
getting wide of the crease, fires it in on the off stump, Hopes stays in his crease and defends it with a straight bat
short on middle and leg, dabbed to square leg
fullish on the off stump, pushed gently towards mid-off
oversteps, short on middle and leg, dropped short of square leg for a single
drilled down the ground, makes full use of that freebie, full on the off stump, length ball and Hopes launches into the drive, striking it wide of the Steyn for a boundary all along the ground
short on the off stump, coming back in just a hint, defended off the back foot
down the leg side, false start, given a wide
short of a length on middle and leg, turned away to square leg
short of a length on the off stump, punched off the back foot to cover
much better, fuller on middle and leg, flicked away to square leg
down the leg side again, gifts a run for the second time in the over
on middle and leg, gets back and works it towards square leg
fraction short outside off, gets back and cuts it to de Villers at cover, nicely struck but fails to pierce the gap, there aren't as many on the off side
slower one bowled slightly short on middle, pushed to midwicket for a single
fullish on middle and leg, dabbed wide of midwicket
short of a length on the off stump, chopped down to point
short and wide, cut away fiercely but there's cover in the deep, deep point runs to his left, dives and saves a couple of runs
good length on the off stump, defended to Morkel off the front foot
short of a good length on middle, pushed to mid-on
outstanding fielding by Gibbs, driven firmly wide of short cover where he flings himself to his left to save a certain boundary
what say now? Fraction short outside off, is on the back foot to force it through point, gets a thick edge and Johan Botha takes a dolly at first slip
short on middle and off, is behind it nicely and defends it solidly to cover
short of a length on middle and again, plays an identical shot as off the previous ball, a textbook back-foot defense
fuller outside off, trying to induce him into the drive, left alone to the keeper
good length on middle and leg, defended in the direction of midwicket
Johnson has a waft outside off this time, it's short and wide but the ball moves away to just beat the outside edge
on middle and off, eased through the off side towards deep cover
tried to york him on middle but didn't quite get the length correct, flicked away behind square, takes a while for deep square leg to cut that off, gets a couple
short of a length on the off stump, plays an attacking shot towards cover but Botha does well to get his hands to it
probing him just a fraction outside off, left alone
slower ball bowled short on middle and off, an offcutter at 114.1 kmph, defended short of cover

dropped, tough chance but could have been snapped, short on middle, gets back and punches it firmly back to the bowler, Morkel bends down to pouch it on his follow through, reacts well but fails to get his fingers around it
pushed off the back foot wide of extra cover for a single
full on the off stump, defended confidently towards cover
good length outside off, angling away from the left hander, left alone
fullish on the off stump, driven wide of cover for a single
good length on the off stump, gets forward and blocks it towards extra cover
short on middle and leg, dropped into the leg side short of midwicket for a quick single
Flighted on middle and off, gets forward and bunts it to long-on
tossed up outside off, lands full, holds its line, left alone
quicker through the air, good length on the off, tries to defend into the off side, gets a thick inside edge behind square
tossed up on middle, gets forward, covers the spin well and turns it into the leg side
full on middle, driven down the ground to long-on
quicker one fired in on the off stump, defended watchfully
full on the off stump, driven through the line to mid-off
good length on the off stump, defended to cover
short on middle, turned away wide of midwicket, brings up the 50 and the crowd cheer sarcastically
short of a good length on the off, guided to point
short on middle, gets back and punches it to cover
edged and four, there's no second slip, short and wide, slashes hard, was worth the effort
tossed up on the off stump, gets outside the line and drops it on the leg side
slightly quicker through the air, on middle and off, turned to midwicket
short outside off and spinning in, dabbed to midwicket, runs have dried up
quicker ball bowled full outside off, steered to deep point
flighted on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
straying on the pads, tucked away towards fine leg
slightly short on the off stump, Johnson stands tall and drives that to mid-off
short on the off stump, tries to swat it over mid-on, ends up slicing it on the bounce to mid-off, risky shot that
back of a length on the off stump, pushed firmly off the back foot to cover
much fuller on the off stump, forced through the leg side between midwicket and mid-on for three runs, that will relieve the pressure just a little
fuller down the leg side, flicked away in front of fine leg for a couple
good over this for Australia, just a fraction short outside off, gets back and cuts it wide of deep point for a boundary, Ferguson hanging in there
fullish on the off stump, driven back to the bowler
full on the off stump, gets forward and guides it to point
quicker ball bowled short on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
struck cleanly, tossed up on middle, comes down the track and deposits it into the stands over long-on
tossed up on middle and leg, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
slightly quicker through the air, pushed back to the bowler
short on middle and leg, tucked towards square leg
flighted on the off stump, eased through the cover region for a single
dipping into the left hander, full on middle, pushed back to the bowler
pushed back to the bowler
flighted on middle and leg, gets forward and punches it back to Botha
driven down the ground to long-on for a single
tossed up on middle and off, pushed through the leg side for a single
short on the off stump, a top spinner, pulled away towards deep midwicket
flighted on middle and off, drawing him forward, defended watchfully onto the pitch
back of a length on the off, punched to cover
flighted on middle, gets forward and bunts it to long-on
short of a length on the off and spinning in, worked wide of short fine for a single
low full toss on the off stump, struck through the line to long-off, singles readily available here now
short of a good length on the off and spun in, defended back to the bowler
quicker ball bowled full outside off, driven on the bounce to cover
slightly short on middle and leg, dabbed to midwicket
short on the off stump, pulled away but not firmly, to square leg
quicker one bowled full outside off, guided off the front foot to point
full on the off stump, driven to long-on

yorker fired in on the leg stump, really quick through the air, Johnson didn't pick it, missed it and was struck on the pads as he tried to dig that out but the angle would have taken it down the leg side
good length on middle and leg, turned towards square leg
flighted on the off, comes down the track and drives it straight to cover
full on the off stump, blocked to cover
angling into the right hander, full on middle and leg, struck down the ground to long-on
on leg stump, tickled behind square leg for a single
full on middle, almost yorked himself there, he's got a big backlift but managed to get the bat down in time, fell over as he pushed that to long-on, brings up the 50 partnership
tossed up on middle and off, defended watchfully to the bowler
driven off the front foot to midwicket, full on middle and leg
flighted on middle and off, pushed wide of the bowler for a single
fired in on leg stump and Johnson is rapped on the pads again, would have gone down, quicker one that he failed to pick for the second time
flighted on middle, down the track and drives it to midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, driven to long-on
Ferguson does the same, taking it on the full to drive it on the leg side
full on middle, presents the full face to push it back to the bowler
good length on the off stump, gets forward and blocks it wide of cover for a single
back of a length on middle, pushed back to the bowler on the back foot
short on the off, stands tall and punches it to cover
back of a length outside off again, finds the gap this time, strikes it firmly to deep cover
a little too straight there, full on middle, turned away comfortably to deep midwicket
down the leg side, short outside leg stump, Johnson tries to whip it fine but misses, gets a wide though
full on the off stump, driven firmly but straight to Graeme Smith at mid-off
quicker one on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
pushes it off the front foot to long-on for the umpteenth time off Botha's bowling
fired in down the leg side, the quicker one, given a wide
lands on a good length on leg stump, turned to square leg
gives it some air, it lands full on middle, dug out back to the bowler
flighted on middle, comes down the track and drills it towards long-on, brings up the 100 for Australia
short of a length outside off, dabbed between point and cover for a single
full on the off stump, driven to cover
and again, a low full toss on the off, pushes it straight to the cover fielder
back of a length on the off stump, chopped down to point
full on the off, finds the gap this time, hits through the line to long-off
down the leg side, tickles the pads on the way to the keeper
nice flowing drive or so we thought, rolled to cover, beautiful follow through but there was no strength in that shot
short on the off stump, guided to point off the back foot
full on the pads, clipped behind square for a single
tossed up outside off, struck through the cover region for a single towards the deep

done in by the doosra, landed on a good length outside off, slow through the air, Johnson, expecting it to spin away leans forward to defend but the ball turns the other way to strike him on the pads in line with middle and off
tossed up on middle, driven to midwicket
quicker one on the off stump, lunges forward to defend it back to the bowler
short on middle and leg, turned away behind square for a single
full on leg stump, helps it on its way to fine leg
flighted on middle, pushed back to the bowler
straying on the pads, tries to clip it fine, misses
dipping into the right hander, full on middle, tries to drive it back past the bowler who dives well to his left to save a single
a lethargic drive to the covers, full on the off and he just played through the line without much intent
tossed up on middle and off, driven wide of midwicket
pushed off the front foot wide of point for a single
flighted on middle and off, plays it with a straight bat back to the bowler
short on middle, gets back and punches it to long-on
sweetly timed but only for a run, flighted outside off, makes room and chips it wide of long-off
short of a length outside off, bunts it wide of point for a quick single
flighted on leg stump, driven past an enthusiastic  van der Merwe who dives to his right even though he doesn't have a chance, all that effort just for saving a single
pushed through quick on the off stump, pushed to cover
flighted on middle and off, defended into the leg side
excellent shot, tossed up outside off, comes down the track and makes room simultaneously to chip that between deep cover and long-off for a one bounce four
quicker one on middle and leg, pushed through the line to long-on
some zip immediately for the bowler, short of a good length outside off and moves away sharply to beat the outside edge as he hangs his bat out
slightly short on middle, takes his bottom hand off to defend it down to point
short and wide, cut away towards deep point
beaten this time, full outside off and gets some good movement away from the batsmen as he tries to defend that off the back foot
slightly short outside off, pushed to cover off the back foot
short of a length outside off and swung away, left to the keeper
short of a length outside off, chopped down to point
short of a length outside off, gets back, opens the face and plays it to third man to bring up his second ODI fifty, a determined innings that, has helped Australia salvage a better score here
short and wide, goes for the cut, but is surprised by the bounce, the keeper collects it waist high
similar delivery but lets it go this time, good bounce again
goes for it, full outside off, gets forward and slices that over point to beat the gap between deep cover and deep point, a handy boundary

superb catch, a fierce delivery bowled on a good length on the off stump, jumped off the pitch to catch Ferguson on the gloves as he tried to back away, de Villiers, sensing the opportunity, charged forward from point, dived full length and snapped it inches from the ground
back of a length outside off and moving back in, left alone
short on the off, dabbed wide of cover for a single
similar ball as the one bowled to Ferguson, and good speed too, at 145 kmph, Hauritz did well to evade that
short on middle, gets back and defends it on the pitch
beaten, pushed through on a good length outside off, jagged back in a touch, Hauritz pushed at it and pretended to withdraw once he was beaten
fullish on the off stump, drives it back to the bowler
short outside off, makes room and swats it back past the bowler and wide of mid-off for a boundary
good length on the off stump, pushed into the leg side
back of a length on the off, dabbed into the off side short of cover

Parnell gets four! Fraction short outside off, chases it, looks to cart it over the in-field on the off side, mistimes it completely and Gibbs  has to run just a few steps backwards to take the easiest of catches at cover
bouncer on middle, he ducks under it well but that leaves the No.11 on strike for the next over
beaten there, good length outside off and moved away to beat the outside edge just as he tried to prod at it off the back foot
edged and just wide of a diving Gibbs at gully, slightly short on the off and he plays at it but the movement almost does him in
down the leg side this time, tries to whip it fine, misses, but earns a wide
short of a length on the off, is nicely behind it and punches it to mid-off
bouncer outside off, makes room to upper cut that over the slips, you wish
full and wide, makes room to steer that behind point, he's given himself too much width there, fails to reach it
back of a length on the off stump, pushed to cover, can he get a five-for here?
short on middle and moving into the right hander, raps him on the ribs as he tries to play it into the leg side
short on leg stump, tries to dab it in front of square to give his senior partner the strike, is hit on the thighs
yorker on middle, dug out well, played back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, holds its line there, leaves it alone to the keeper, wise choice
fullish outside off, tries to drive it to cover, gets a thick edge to third man, Hauritz decides against the single and keeps the strike for the next over
full outside off on a driving length, Hauritz goes for it but misses as the ball moves away really late

edged and gone! Four each for Parnell and Steyn! Full outside off and gets the late movement again, much closer to the off stump this time, Hauritz goes for the drive, gets a thin edge and Boucher takes a sitter

inn2.comm: targeting those gloves again, short on the off stump, dropped into the off side short of cover
short of a good length on the off, defended into the off side
back of a length on the off, pushed with a straight bat back to the bowler
one short ball too many, outside off and Smith drags it over midwicket, pulling it for a boundary
much fuller, good length on the off and a hint of away movement, left alone to the keeper
full on the off stump, pushed through the line to mid-off
probing line outside off, Gibbs prods at it but is beaten by the away movement
full on the off stump, driven through the line to mid-off
good length on middle and off, closes the face and defends it on the leg side
full on the off stump, plays a lethargic drive towards mid-off
short on middle, gets back and tickles it behind square for a couple, fine leg takes a while to run in and cut that off
good length on middle and leg, defended watchfully towards midwicket
good length on the off stump, defended off the front foot back to the bowler
full on the pads, tries to flick it fine, misses, fails to latch on to an opportunity there
full on the off stump, drops it on the pitch, calls for a single but is wisely sent back
full and straight, driven firmly back to the bowler, Johnson does well to field it on his follow through
short of a length outside off, just enough width for Smith to run it down to third man
gone! Full, length ball outside off, Gibbs gets forward and drives it straight to Hauritz at cover who holds on to a sharp catch
full on the off stump, tries to drive it through the line past the bowler, gets a thick outside edge into the gap between point and cover for three runs
good length on the off stump, pushed to cover
back of a length on the off stump, stands tall and defends it to mid-off
full outside off, gets forward and drives it on the up to mid-off
full on the off and swinging in, Kallis tackles it well, getting his foot forward and presenting the full face to play it to mid-off
short of a length outside off, just a fraction wide, slashed away to third man
down the leg side, tries to help it on its way to the fine-leg boundary, misses, gets a wide
full outside off, gets forward and slices it to gully
slower ball bowled short outside off, Kallis is into the pull a little too early, misses
back of a length outside off, mistimes a cut to cover
short of a good length on the off stump, defended watchfully to cover
short outside off and Kallis has no trouble rocking back and pulling it over midwicket for a boundary
full outside off, holds its line, left alone to the keeper
full outside off, shuffles and flicks it away beautifully wide of a diving midwicket, that was all timing there
similar delivery, fullish on the off stump, works it away between midwicket and mid-on this time, two more
the runs are flowing here, short of a length on middle and off, just a small shuffle and he whips it off his hips behind square to beat fine leg. He's on the move now
sensibly done, just a fraction short outside off, dabbed down to third man for a single
good length on middle and off, turned away to midwicket

the close-in fielder on the off side prompts him to move across and defend that towards midwicket, bowled on a good length on the off stump, under normal circumstances, he would have tried to drive through the line
slower ball bowled full on middle, defended towards midwicket
short and wide, came onto the bat really slow there, he was already into an attempted cut, ended up chopping it awkwardly short of cover
short of a good length on middle, gets behind and dabs it to midwicket
full on the off stump, driven to mid-on off the front foot
cut away powerfully, it's short and wide, slashes it wide of point, Bracken at third man runs across, dives and cuts it off inches short of the boundary
poor ball, full outside off, launches into the drive to pierce the gap between point and cover, finishes off the brief period before lunch in style
good length outside off, holding its line, good carry through to the keeper
moves across and defends it towards midwicket, just fractionally short on middle and off
back of a length on the off stump, punched to cover off the back foot
short and wide, cut away behind point for a couple towards third man
superbly done, full on middle and off, Kallis moves across and drives it between mid-on and midwicket, wristy shot that, subcontinental stuff
held it back there, banged it in short outside off, left alone
short of a good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
full on the off stump, defended off the front foot towards cover
short of a length outside off, slashes hard at it, reaches for it but misses
struck on the ribs, short on middle, tries to pull that behind square, misses
full on the leg stump, flicked away to fine leg for a single
full on middle, bowled at 139.5 kmph, driven back to the bowler who reacts sharply to throw it back at the striker's end
starts off well, good length on the off stump, defended off the back foot to cover
yorker length outside off, at 131.8 kmph, defended to cover
short of a good length on the off, opens the face to guide it to third man
straying on the pads, Kallis moves across to turn it behind square, is hit on the pads
poor ball, short and wide, gets back and punches it through the covers for a boundary
easily done, straying on the pads this time, full on middle and leg, whipped away wide of square leg, Laughlin has let it slip after a decent start
banged in short on the off stump, a bouncer, Smith backs away but it's too high, given a no-ball and that brings up the fifty
short of a length outside off, pulled away behind square wide of fine leg for a couple
good length on middle and off, pushed into the off side
full outside off, waits for it and guides it delicately past the keeper by opening the face at the last moment, races away to the third-man boundary
yorker on middle, good comeback,  dug out back to the bowler
South Africa are coasting along here, full on the pads, tries to glance it down fine, misses but the ball clips the pads to roll down the fine-leg boundary
full on middle and leg, flicked away to midwicket
tossed up on the off stump, gets outside the line and drops it into the leg side
flighted outside off stump, driven down the ground to long-on

round the wicket to the left hander, on middle and leg, gets down the sweep, misses, is struck on the front pad, looked pretty adjacent but the umpire thought otherwise. Jerling perhaps thought it was missing off. Replays indicate the ball would have gone over the stumps. So we were both wrong
pushed off the back foot wide of cover
turned away into the leg side for a single
tossed up outside off, comes down the track, takes it on the full and drives it wide of deep midwicket for a couple
short of a good length outside off, run down to third man for a single
full on the off stump, driven firmly back past the bowler wide of Ferguson at mid-off, he dives to his right to keep the batsmen down to a single
full on the off stump, drives it down the ground cross-batted, Ferguson gives chase and drags it back just inside he ropes
short on leg stump, tries to whip it away behind square, is struck on the thighs, they get a leg bye
the inswinger, lands on a good length on the off and moves back in, defended solidly towards mid-off
useless delivery, full toss outside off, Kallis puts it out of its misery by dispatching it to the deep extra-cover boundary
tossed up on middle and leg, comes down the track and pushes it to midwicket
short of a good length on the off stump, chopped short of point
fuller on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
flighted on middle and off, gets forward, drops it short of cover and gets an easy single
gets forward and dabs it between point and cover for a single
short on middle, pulled away to deep square leg
he strikes immediately! Slower ball bowled on a good length outside off, Smith is into his shot a little too early, the ball stops on him and he ends up chipping a simple catch to Clarke at mid-on
short on the off stump dropped into the off side on the back foot
fullish on middle and leg, turned away behind square, but doesn't get the single
good ball, yorker length on middle, dug out into the off side
short of a good length on the off stump, defended off the back foot towards the bowler
slower ball bowled short of a good length outside off, de Villiers lets it go
short of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
flighted outside off, driven to cover again
tossed up on the off stump, closes the face to push it to midwicket
good length on the off stump, gets across and whips it away to deep midwicket
full on the off stump, clipped off his pads wide of Laughlin at deep square leg who fumbles to allow them to get back for the second
tossed up on the off stump, worked away behind square for a single
short and wide, goes for the cut, gets a thick outside edge wide of third man for a couple
good length on the off stump, defended solidly to cover
short and wide, tries to slash it past point, gets an inside edge this time, Haddin dives to his left and does well to get his glove to it, keeps them down to a single
slower ball bowled full on the off stump, reaches forward to defend
slower ball on middle, bowled full, Kallis is lucky to get an inside edge onto his pads as he tries to drive that down the ground, gets a single
short on middle, pulled away powerfully wide of deep square leg who is quick on his feet while moving to his right and keeps the batsmen down to just one
starts with a wide, short ball down the leg side
short of a length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
wide down the leg side again, short and he tries to pull it behind square, why the effort when a free run is on offer?
good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot wide of midwicket
fuller on the off stump, gets forward and plays it back to Johnson
short on leg stump, helped on its way to fine leg
short of a good length on middle and leg, gets back and turns it away to fine leg
almost dragged it on, good length outside off, prods unconvincingly, gets the inside edge just wide of the off stump
full on middle and leg, glanced down to fine leg
fullish on the off stump, defended off the front foot to cover
length ball on middle, gets across and drives it wide of mid-on for a single
on target, good length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
short and wide, he misses out, goes for a fierce cut through point but fails to make contact
slower ball bowled on a good length outside off, Kallis has nothing to do with it
short on middle and leg, whipped away to fine leg
too wide, Johnson has a bit of trouble with his direction today, this time it's well outside off
Kallis tries to smash that over mid-off and extra cover, it's in the slot, full outside off stump but ends up getting a faint nick to the keeper. This should slow proceedings down a little
short on middle, walks across to dab it behind square, is hit on the chest
short on the off stump, jumps up and drops it down with soft hands on the leg side
short on the off stump, a slower ball, pulls too early, is struck on the shoulder this time
good length on the off stump, defended cautiously back to the bowler
full on the pads, worked away to fine leg for a single
slower ball bowled full on leg stump, driven to midwicket
bouncer banged in short on middle, Duminy ducks under it well
slower ball bowled on a good length on the off stump, defended to cover
full on middle and leg, flicked away between deep midwicket and deep square leg for a single
short of a length outside off, hangs his bat out, gets an under edge to the keeper
fuller and a little wider, played down to point, things have gone quiet here, not the most exciting phase of the game this
de Villiers puts that to rest, full outside off, gets down on one knee and crease that stylishly through the covers, brings up the 100
short on middle and leg, kept low but manages to pull it away behind square for a single
full on the off stump, driven past the bowler to mid-on

banged in short outside off, there's a short midwicket in place but he's unperturbed, pulls it away in front of square, a valiant effort by the fielder who gives chase to drag it back in but he ends up deflecting it into the ropes
fullish on the off stump, played wide of midwicket for a quick single
overpitched on the off stump, just pushes it gently to mid-off
good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
short outside leg stump, slaps it towards deep square leg
back of a length on the off stump, dabbed to cover
short of a length outside off and moving away, reaches for it to play a cut but misses
short and wide, slashed away to third man for a single
de Villiers is in a hurry to finish this off now, flighted outside off stump, gives him the charge and smashes it over long-on for a massive six
slightly short on the off stump, paddles it fine for a couple
short of a length on the off stump, gets across and pushes it wide of midwicket for a single
tossed up on leg stump, comes down the track t dab it into the leg side, is hit on the pads, would have gone down
short of a length on leg stump, pushed wide of short fine for a quick single
tossed up outside off, gets outside the line and flicks it to square leg
good length on middle and off, pushed towards midwicket
full on the off stump, driven off the front foot to mid-off
short of a length outside off, comes back in just a little, mistimes a backfoot drive to cover
full on the off stump, chips it between long-on and deep midwicket for a couple
overpitched on middle, driven on the up to mid-on, the end is near
yorker on middle, dug out back to the bowler
tossed up outside leg, comes down the track to push it wide of midwicket, gets a leg bye on the off side
saw him give the charge, bowled it quick on the off stump, de Villiers adjusted well to defend it to cover
flighted outside off, driven through the leg side for a single
short on middle and leg, bunted wide of short fine for a single
thrown up on the off side, pushed through to deep midwicket
tossed up on middle, gets his front foot across and sweeps it down wide of deep square leg for a couple. Just four more to get
good length on middle and off, defended solidly back to the bowler
all over! Full on the off stump, makes room and carts that over extra cover for a one bounce four to finish the proceedings
